Description: Unique identifier for the Processor Monthly Performance Report (MPR).
Unique ID for the Contracting Entity (CE) or Processor.
Type of entity holding the inventory.
Unique identifier for the USDA Food commodity.
Description of the USDA Food commodity.
Date the inventory count was taken (MPR submission month-end).
Total pounds of the product currently in inventory.
Rolling 6-month average usage (pounds) by the entity.
The "Best If Used By" Date for the oldest lot in inventory.
Months of Hold (MOH): Current_Inventory_LBS / Avg_Monthly_Usage_LBS. (The core metric.)
